title: Enable Parallel Execution for CLI Operations
overview:
CLI operations currently run sequentially even when they could be parallelized, resulting in slower overall execution times.

**Motivation:** Performance improvement - reduces total execution time for workflows that can run operations in parallel.

**Signals:** priority: high, urgency: Top priority gap - performance
problem_statement: CLI operations currently run sequentially even when they could be parallelized, resulting in slower overall execution times.
motivation: Performance improvement - reduces total execution time for workflows that can run operations in parallel.
